name: Easy Mahi Mahi Fish Tacos
author: jacquixox
summary: These fish tacos are delicious and light. Best of both worlds! This is a great dish when you're on the go, as it's quick and easy. Enjoy. Add habanero hot sauce and low-fat sour cream to your preference.
directions: Season mahi mahi lightly with adobo seasoning and 1 dash of lime juice
Mix tomato, red onion, cilantro, scallions, and 2 tablespoons lime juice together in a bowl for the pico de gallo
Lightly spray a nonstick skillet with cooking spray; turn stove to medium-high heat
Cook mahi mahi until golden brown, about 2 minutes per side
Reduce heat to low; cook, covered, until fish flakes easily with a fork, about 10 minutes
Place corn tortillas between damp paper towels; microwave until heated through, 30 seconds to 1 minute
Place 1/2 of each mahi mahi fillet on a tortilla
Top each with 2 slices avocado and 1 scoop of pico de gallo
